m_szDocSumamry: News:Archive:2013:February Click here for most recent news. 2013 Featured / Buyer Beware : Noble Gas Engines > PlasmERG > Psychic Reading of John Rohner — Physical Danger - Q. has he ever had one of these engines running? A. He has, but has had a lot of setbacks; things didn’t go right; has to re-do, breaking down, re-do, seeing what went wrong... Lets ego get in the way of admitting where he's at. In discussing, he jumps ahead of where he's actually at. Certainly not ready to go into production. The configuration as it is could be emitting dangerous fields... ( PureEnergyBlog ; February 28, 2
